meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: THE LAST OLYMPICS STORY YOU'LL READ... MAYBE

div.a: Google Dives Deep Into The Digital Games

div.div: The stats are in, and one clear winner from this year’s summer sports has emerged: digital media. Here’s a quick look behind the “screens” at how the web blew records away around the world, at the most wired Games ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PjGlaK&via=Digg&text=Google Dives Deep Into The Digital Games

div.div: EXPLOSIVE FARTS

div.a: Antidepressants Can Trigger Orgasms And Other Weird Things Your Body Can Do

div.div: nytimes.com - via @jackshafer

"A gassy gut can be fatal, as it was for a patient having a colonic polyp cauterized. An electric spark caused the patient’s bowels to detonate, blasting out the colonoscope and ripping a six-inch hole in the patient’s large intestine."

li.div: "Fart" may be too lowbrow for the New York Times, but not for us - nytimes.com/2012/08/14/sci... #curious
"Some antidepressants produce yawns that trigger orgasms." nytimes.com/2012/08/14/sci...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QYE2tj&via=Digg&text=Antidepressants Can Trigger Orgasms And Other Weird Things Your Body Can Do

div.div: BLACK BAG

On an idyllic lake surrounded by woods and a double row of mesh-and-razor-wire fences about 100 miles north of Warsaw, there stands a secluded villa that the CIA once used to interrogate — and allegedly torture —top al Qaida suspects.
THE ONLY THING THAT COULD MAKE YO-YOS COOL

div.a: NASA Astronaut Plays With Yo-Yos, Gives Flirting Tips In Space

div.div: In episode 14 of "Science off the Sphere," watch as NASA Astronaut Don Pettit used his "off-duty time" on a recent International Space Station expedition to play with yo-yos.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PPeMAH&via=Digg&text=NASA Astronaut Plays With Yo-Yos, Gives Flirting Tips In Space

div.div: OOPS

div.a: Leader Of Anti-Semitic Party Discovers He's Jewish

div.div: One of the leaders of Hungary's Jobbik Party, which the Anti-Defamation League says is one of the few political parties in Europe to overtly campaign with anti-Semitic materials, has discovered that he is himself a Jew.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NzkhHQ&via=Digg&text=Leader Of Anti-Semitic Party Discovers He's Jewish

div.div: WONKA NOT INVOLVED

While there's some evidence that chocolate is good for you, the fact remains that it's so full of fat and sugar that binging on it will make you fat. Now, though, scientists have developed a healthier version of chocolate using fruit juice—but how the hell does it work?
BIG DATA

div.a: Uber Data Can Locate The 'Party Neighborhoods' In Any City

div.div: "With Uber, temporal patterns of demand tell us about the neighborhoods of the cities we service."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QZTa9H&via=Digg&text=Uber Data Can Locate The 'Party Neighborhoods' In Any City

div.div: PATENT WARS

div.a: All Of Apple's Patent Claims Against Samsung In One Chart

div.div: With three feature patents, four design patents, and 20 different devices Apple says Samsung is infringing, this case is a little bit complicated. Here's a chart that explains everything.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NeFJiA&via=Digg&text=All Of Apple's Patent Claims Against Samsung In One Chart

div.div: AND THAT'S WHY YOU DON'T HOLD NAMING CONTESTS

div.a: Mountain Dew Admits Defeat, Speaks In Third Person

div.div: In the wake of getting massively punked by 4chan and Redditors, Mountain Dew admits that “Dub the Dew definitely lost to The Internet.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qys6u3&via=Digg&text=Mountain Dew Admits Defeat, Speaks In Third Person

div.div: LIFESTYLES OF THE THE RICH AND FAMOUS

div.a: Inside Hollywood's Illegal High Stakes Poker Game

div.div: A-list stars, athletes, "masseurs," and million dollar pots were the norm inside Hollywood's most exclusive poker game. But that was all before a financial scandal brought the whole thing crashing down.

li.div: Tobey Maguire, A-Rod, Jeffrey Katzenberg, cocaine, prostitutes -- Hollywood's high stakes gambling ring revealed celebuzz.com/2012-08-13/po...
Toby Maguire reportedly won up to $40 million playing poker in Hollywood over 3 yr period: celebuzz.com/2012-08-13/po... (h/t @pier0)

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tyk748&via=Digg&text=Inside Hollywood's Illegal High Stakes Poker Game

div.div: IS THIS MOTHRA'S ORIGIN STORY?

A group of scientists in Japan made a surprising discovery by finding large numbers of specimens of pale grass blue butterflies that had mutated. It had previously been thought that insects were highly resistant to radiation.

li.div: Don't say Mothra, don't say Mothra, don't say Mothra RT @CBSNews: Mutated butterflies found near Fukushima, Japan cbsnews.com/8301-202_162-5...

div.div: MORE BANG FOR YOUR BUCK

div.a: Police Bust Prostitutes Using Airbnb Apartment

div.div: Two Airbnb users returned from vacation to find that their home had been turned into a high-class brothel.
FLYING BLIND

div.a: FAA Documents Raise Questions About Safety Of Drones In U.S. Airspace

div.div: Regulators are facing questions about whether federal flight rules for drones are strong enough to prevent accidents and midair collisions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TBP8UZ&via=Digg&text=FAA Documents Raise Questions About Safety Of Drones In U.S. Airspace

div.div: PIZZA FRANKENSTEIN
Tired of having to purchase your pizzas and Cinnabon rolls separately? Introducing the Pizzabon.

li.div: Pizza at Cinnabon? This can't end well. gawker.com/5934769/cinnabon-en...

div.div: ALL SRIRACHA, ALL THE TIME

div.a: How Addicted To Sriracha Are You?

div.div: When you eat food without Sriracha, do you feel like you're not experiencing your meal at its full potential?
BAD LANGUAGE
Think you've written the worst opening sentence of the year? You haven't.
DON'T MESS WITH THE PEOPLE THAT CONTROL YOUR URL
Think Google doesn’t have a sense humour? Well, you’re wrong.
CROWDSOURCED CRYPTOGRAPHY

div.a: Only You Can Help Crack An 'Encrypted Warhead'

div.div: Researchers at Kaspersky Lab in Russia are asking the public for help in cracking an encrypted warhead that gets delivered to infected machines by the Gauss malware toolkit.

li.div: matrix-green hex digits on a black background; how could it have been otherwise? wired.com/threatlevel/2012...
